named-query.name: AsyncTaskEntity.findByWorkerOrderByCreateDatetimeTaskId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AsyncTaskEntity a WHERE a.id.worker = :worker ORDER BY a.createDatetime, a.id.taskId

named-query.name: DbmsSchedulerEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM DbmsSchedulerEntity a ORDER BY a.id.jobGroup, a.id.jobId
